response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product is worth $1,200,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000, which I believe is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate.

Please let me know if you have any questions about the product or need more information to make an informed decision. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
